title: Data Merge
infoText: Select the data you want to merge. The selected data will be written to a new NFC tag.

empty.title: No Scans Found
empty.description: You can use data from your scan history for merging.

alerts.selectData: Please select at least one data item
alerts.bringPhoneNear: Please bring your phone close to the NFC tag
alerts.mergeSuccess: Data successfully merged and written to NFC tag
